head.title: Life Today Audio

body.class: usa en product podcast audio full-footer

div.p: LIFE TODAY is an innovative Christian television broadcast that is sharing the Gospel of Jesus Christ with people all over the United States, Canada and Australia. LIFE TODAY not only ministers to people directly, but it presents the other outreaches of LIFE so that people may take part in our ministry and vision.
